Perfect for standing tall boxes on their end

  • Professional Sales Bags A-E

Large Nueromodulation Bag

Our Large Neuromodulation Bag is our deepest sales bag. It is designed to store tall boxes in their upright position, allowing you to see the labels on the side of the boxes. It is designed to hold 14 linear contact trial lead kit boxes and your laptop, leaving 8 inches for the rest of your supplies.

CUSTOM BAG FEATURES:

  • Embroidery options for up to 3 sides of the bag
  • Foam padding throughout the inside and hard plastic on the outside to protect your equipment
  • Interior foam padding and exterior hard plastic to protect your equipment
  • Commercial grade materials
  • 7 zipper pockets for literature and product storage
  • Our Watts Bags exclusive wheel system
  • Customizable interior with removable/adjustable divider system
  • Padded internal divider to protect laptop
  • Add-on strap that wraps around the handle of a briefcase, laptop bag, purse, etc

  • Learn more about bag features

Small Nueromodulation Bag

Our Small Neuromodulation Bag is a smaller version of our Large Neuromodulation Bag. It holds deep boxes with side labels. It also has 3 large outer pockets for smaller products and a laptop. It was originally designed to hold 6 linear contact trial lead kit boxes with exterior overflow pockets. This heavy-duty luggage piece is built to last.

CUSTOM BAG FEATURES:

  • Embroidery options for up to 3 sides of the bag
  • Foam padding throughout the inside and hard plastic on the outside to protect your equipment
  • Interior foam padding and exterior hard plastic to protect your equipment
  • Commercial grade materials
  • 1 zipper pockets for product literature
  • Our Watts Bags exclusive wheel system
  • 3 large pouch pockets for extra product storage and a laptop 
  • Padded internal divider to protect laptop
  • Add-on strap that wraps around the handle of a briefcase, laptop bag, purse, etc

  • Learn more about bag features

  • Rigid Weight: 17.5 lbs
  • Lightened Weight: 14.3 lbs 
  • Empty Dimensions: 20" Deep x 18" Wide x 29" Long
  • Loaded Dimensions: 20" Deep x 18" Wide x 33" Long
  • Internal Dimensions: 16.5" Deep x 17" Wide x 25" Long
